B.A. in Mass Media with Secondary Teacher Certification
What Can You Do With a Mass Media Degree?
Why Earn My Mass Media Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Whether you enjoy the actual act of storytelling or being part of the team behind the scenes who helps bring a story to life, a mass media major could be the start of your very own chapter.

Our mass media program allows you to specialize your degree plan for advertising/public relations, electronic/digital media or journalism. A teacher certification option is also available. No matter which path you choose, you’ll gain valuable technical knowledge through hands-on experience in our state-of-the-art facilities outfitted with the latest equipment, allowing you to join an exciting industry with plenty of experience under your belt.
Our faculty stay up to date on current industry trends, and are recognized frequently for their work and research. You’ll work side by side with your professors in our on-campus media outlets.
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.
Earning your ASU mass media degree will open doors for you into a wide variety of media careers, or prepare you for graduate school.
Our graduates enjoy careers across the U.S. as TV anchors, reporters, producers, journalists, and in public relations, advertising and video production.

Gain hands-on experience in our on-campus Ram TV station, Ram TV Sports Broadcasting program, Ram Radio internet radio station and/or Ram Page student newspaper. You can also intern at local companies, nonprofit agencies, media outlets, production companies and advertising agencies.
Network with media professionals at campus, state and regional seminars. You can also study media while you enjoy European culture in our summer study abroad program.

Our facilities boast a fully operational live television studio, as well as new, state-of-the-art video production equipment. Our live broadcasts of ASU sports are a great way to learn the technical aspects of TV production. Plus, our Ram Page newspaper has gone fully digital, and we have all the gear you need to produce your own radio show.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
